price: មហាមានពរជ័យនាមនៃម្ចាស់របស់អ្នកដែលមានភាព ខ្ពង់ខ្ពស់និងថ្កុំថ្កើង។
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
